New Records: Lionel Messi became the second highest all-time international men’s goalscorer, eclipsing Ali Daei with 109 goals.
Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored his first goal of Copa America 2024 in the 51st minute, helping Argentina reach the final.
Julian Alvarez scored the opening goal for Argentina.
Alphonso Davies was forced to leave the game with an injury in the 71st minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Canada coach Jesse Marsch reflected on the team's performance, stating that the tournament caught up with them and emphasized the need to develop more players for future tournaments.
Marsch expressed pride in his team's performance and optimism about the future.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina will face the winner of Uruguay vs. Colombia in the final on July 14, 2024.
Canada will play in the third-place game against the loser of Uruguay vs. Colombia on July 13, 2024.
